title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Time Management Skill Enhancement Program for E-Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic online learning functionalities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their time preference type and apply it to online learning environments.

Learners will apply ≥2 time-culture shock mitigation strategies (e.g., shift work adaptation plans, cultural difference awareness journals) monthly during a 6-month course to actual learning/practice schedules and meet evaluation criteria by submitting weekly performance records (≥80% completion rate).
Learners implement weekly learning plans with over 80% adherence based on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
